bio:
Ghunzul is an old Orsimer warrior, who is encountered in Cracked Tusk Keep in the Falkreath Hold area of Skyrim, and is the guardian of the shards of Mehrunes' Razor.
Ghunzul is the 8th generation of his family to bear the Shards of Mehrunes' Razor. He is the son of Shelakh. He is the leader of the Orcs who have established their home here. He wears heavy armor, normally using steel plate or Nordic carved armor,DR and wields a steel greatsword early in the game. During higher levels, he usually wields a random stronger battleaxe. He carries the key to Cracked Tusk Keep Vaults, where the Shards of Mehrunes' Razor for the quest "Pieces of the Past" are located. He is hostile to the Dragonborn and will attack on sight.
name: Ghunzul
